metadata.title: CVE-2024-22919 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: swftools0.9.2 was discovered to contain a global-buffer-overflowvulnerability via the function parseExpression at swftools/src/swfc.c:2587.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
